group_1.textRight: Um…
<Sana!>

group_1.textLeft: Pwuah?!

group_1.textRight: <I forgot to ask something!>
<Why did you...>
<decide to come along with Kagome?>

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textRight: Um, well, if you're with me, then you can@protect me with your shield,
and I understand that you'd help to reduce@the Union's vigilance…
But that's just for my benefit alone…
So, I was wondering why you wanted to@help me out today…

group_1.textLeft: Umm… How should I say this…

group_1.textRight: <Could it be that Sana has something that's@weighing on her mind?>
I'm sorry…

group_1.textLeft: …No, you're probably right.
To tell you the truth…I'm not helping out just@to be nice…
I'm sorry…

group_1.textRight: No, it's okay…

group_1.textLeft: …I draw picture books…

group_1.textRight: Picture books?

group_1.textLeft: At first, I wanted to save people in situations@like mine.
I also wanted to carry a piece of Ai into@the future.
But, after Ikumi passed away, I couldn't draw@picture books anymore…

group_1.textRight: Isn't it…just a coincidence that you entered@a slump around the same time…?

group_1.textLeft: …No, I probably stopped believing in the power@of picture books, myself.

group_1.textCenter: Those who create these things and those@who enjoy them...
They're just trying to escape from reality.

group_1.textLeft: (What was said in my dream…)
(I'm sure that deep down, that's what I'm truly@afraid of…)
(My brothers just said it for me…)
It's impossible to truly save someone with@only a picture book…
It's all just to turn away from reality and to@comfort oneself…
In the past, I was saved by a picture book.
So, I wanted to save others with picture books.
I think that these things must be connected…

group_1.textRight: Well…

group_1.textLeft: I can't treat people who are injured, like Iroha…
Nor can I support everyone with my experience,@like Yachiyo and Tsuruno…
And I don't have a wide circle of friends@like Felicia…
And unlike Ui...
I can't mediate between Touka and everyone@else, either.
All I can do is draw picture books, which isn't@really a useful skill…
Even with my picture books, I can't earn money@or be helpful…
I don't even know if it's reaching the people@I want to save…
I wonder what use I am in this state…

group_1.textRight: …I can understand your feelings, a little.
I want to help save Magical Girls...
by making them publicly known.
Right now, I'm recording the real-life@experiences of Magical Girls.
However, even if I record everything,@I can't spread it to the public at large…
I'm working to solve that problem with Touka@and the others,
but there are still many uncertainties…

group_1.textLeft: But, Kagome, you have the power of the@Wind Evangelist...

group_1.textRight: That's true.
Certainly, because of the Uwasa's supernatural@power,
I can still find meaning in what I do.

group_1.textLeft: So, the reason why I followed you was because@of the Uwasa…
Your coverage has the power of an Uwasa@behind it.
It's a practical and meaningful action to be able@to save Magical Girls…
So, if I helped someone like you…
Then I could also do things that are practical@and meaningful…
Sorry…I'm sorry…
I'm just using you for my own sake, Kagome…

group_1.textRight: Miss Sana.

group_1.textLeft: Yes?
Pwuah?! W-why are you taking a picture?

group_1.textRight: …Today, I'm interviewing Magical Girls from@various places…
Recording information from you is also very@important.
…Um, I thought about it while talking on@the train…

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*
But, even if you take a picture of me, nobody@but Magical Girls will be able to see me.
I don't think that my pictures are needed to@spread awareness about Magical Girls…

group_1.textRight: That may be true for now, but there may come@a day where they are needed.
After all, the Wind Evangelist's power was@created for that exact purpose.
